TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DynamicClass extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides functionality to create new classes from values in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A> property is set to an expression that contains the `new` function, a class is dynamically created that contains only the properties specified in the `new` function. The parser creates the `new` class by extending the DynamicClass class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a string representation of the dynamic class.
Docs.returns: A string that represents the dynamic class and its properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A> property is set to an expression that contains the `new` function, a class is dynamically created that contains only the properties specified in the `new` function. The parser creates the `new` class by extending the <xref:System.Web.Query.Dynamic.DynamicClass> class. The ToString methods creates a string representation of the properties in the class.
